message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $15000 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the suggestion, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9000 for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I'm willing to negotiate, $9000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $12000, which is my minimum price. Let me know if that works for you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I can agree to purchase the product at $11000.
